title: Metalsmith

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, visit a player. You store every ability used against them that night in a bucket, and learn what exactly you stored.
- At night, you may filter a stored bucket, removing any number of actions stored. (Ex: Remove healing from among the stored actions)
- At night, choose a bucket to dump on a player, using every stored ability on the target. Gain necessary attributes from roles whose abilities you used.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your buckets are stored until used. They are labelled according to whose house they were placed at. (Ex: Deodat Lawson's Bucket)
- You can only store one bucket from each player.
- Retain your Background upon being converted.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate those you wish to not convert, or those who will not join you.
